messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/17/05 5:33:25 PM, litlrooh@... writes:


> -=-Is there another planned for next year?  We didn't make it this year
> but would like to come next year. -=-
>

http://sandradodd.com/abq

That's not conference details, outside place and date, but photos of where it
will be, and at the bottom links to various people's photos to THIS year's.

Rather than discuss the conference in detail here, though, probably better to
check the Live and Learn list. Thanks.

Sandra

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Coming back
messages.msgSnippet: Well, after a long break, I m returning to the list. How was the Live and Learn conference? (Or should I check the archives first??). Is there another planned
messages.messageBody:
Well, after a long break, I'm returning to the list.

How was the Live and Learn conference? (Or should I check the archives
first??).

Is there another planned for next year? We didn't make it this year
but would like to come next year. My son really misses the friends he
made last year in MA.

Kristen
